title: CricketNext – Live Score & News
description:
CricketNext is one of the most read and followed digital destinations for cricket in the Indian Sub-Continent.
A dynamic platform, which offers its viewers live ball-by-ball coverage of all international cricket matches and news ranging from match reports to inside stories on cricket stars, CricketNext is every cricket lover’s one-stop destination. CricketNext also offers the sharpest opinion pieces, most incisive analysis, as well as a unique perspective, besides an extensive stats database dating back more than 140 years of international cricket as we know it.
Live cricket scores and detailed match info on the go:
•	Superfast live scorecard
•	Ball by ball commentary
•	Latest match status
•	Pitch report
•	Team squads
•	SWOT analysis of each contesting team
•	Head to head analysis of each team
•	Top performers of each team
•	Latest news about the match
•	Worm graphs, run rate graphs and interactive ranking graphs to compare team performances
•	Quick scorecard and full scorecard for all major matches
All previous, current and upcoming series: Explore the details of every past, current and upcoming series, across ODI, Test and T20 formats. Our cricket database goes back 140+ years, so you can look up the scorecard of the first Ashes match ever played, or the first ever day-night Test match played, and everything in between. You can also look up the upcoming match schedule for all domestic and international cricket matches.
Latest news and analysis: Stay updated with the latest cricket news, exclusive analysis, live blogs, photos, videos, podcasts and quizzes brought to you by our team of veteran cricket writers and analysts. Ayaz Memon, Prem Panicker and Brian Lara are just a few of CricketNext’s experts.
In-depth cricket statistics: Dig deep down into cricket history by exploring cricket statistics powered by our cricket database going back to 1877. You can enjoy our curated lists of interesting statistics, or you can explore our database and create your own custom stats combos.
Player and team profiles: Find out everything that’s important about your favorite teams and players here. Check out their batting and bowling records, their ICC rankings and all the latest news about them.
Charts and graphs: See graphical representations of how your favourite teams are performing. Compare team performances using our colorful and easy-to-follow graphs.
Polls: Share your opinion on relevant cricket topics and see what our other users have to say!
Favourites: Like your favourite teams, news articles, photos, videos and podcasts, and we will save them for you to revisit whenever you like.
Alerts: Get breaking news and match notifications at regular intervals.
Light and dark mode: Switch between light and dark modes, based on your convenience.
Founded in 2000, CricketNext is owned by the Network18 Group.
Website: news18.com/cricketnext
Facebook: facebook.com/cricketnext
Twitter: twitter.com/cricketnext
